summary: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.
cast: Jamie Kennedy|Taye Diggs|Anthony Anderson|Regina Hall|Blair Underwood|Damien Dante Wayans|Ryan O'Neal|Bo Derek|Jeffrey Tambor|Kal Penn|Nick Swardson|Keili Lefkovitz|Kellie Martin|Greg Grunberg|J.P. Manoux|Howard Mann|Curtis Blanck|Tristan Jarred|Kody Coye|Niecy Nash|Terry Crews|Tory Kittles|Noel Gugliemi|Reynaldo Gallegos|Damion Poitier|Jo Deodato Clark|Suzy Nakamura|Snoop Dogg|James Kiriyama-Lem|Felli Fel|Hi-C|Young Dre|Bigg Steele|Drop Da Bomb|Hal Fishman|Big Boy|Keesha Sharp|Rhona Bennett|Ken Lawson|Sarah Thompson|Michael Quill|Christa Campbell|Giuliana Rancic|Ecco Morgan|Nikki Martinez|Mary Nelson|Hedy Burress|Melanie Benz|Sean Briskey|Josef Cannon|Lionel D. Carson|Dawn Crawford|Mike Epps|Aisha Jamila Francis|Gichi Gamba|Gilley Grey|Dawn Marie Guest|Justin Rodgers Hall|Halla|Christie McNew|Mikie Da Poet|Francesca Poston|Lester Speight|Dan Vitale
title: El más buscado en Malibú
